mdException.name: gov.geoplatform.uasdm.bus.InvalidUasComponentNameException
mdException.label: Invalid Name
mdException.description: Thrown when a user enters an invalid name for a Project, Mission, etc.
mdException.message: Invalid {attributeName}. No spaces or special characters such as <, >, -, +, =, !, @, #, $, %, ^, &, *, ?,/, \ or apostrophes are allowed.

mdException.name: gov.geoplatform.uasdm.bus.DuplicateComponentException
mdException.label: Empty Layer Information
mdException.description: Thrown when someone tries to create a child item whose name conflicts with an existing child name.
mdException.message: [{parentName}] already has a [{childComponentLabel}] with the folder name [{childName}].

mdException.name: gov.geoplatform.uasdm.bus.DuplicateSiteException
mdException.label: Empty Layer Information
mdException.description: Thrown when someone tries to create a site whose name conflicts with an existing site.
mdException.message: A site already exists with the folder name folderName
